short_summary: purchase of one potentiostat/galvanostat for electrochemical measurements
full_summary:
======================================

**Government Tender Announcement**

**Title:** Potentiostat/Galvanostat

**Contract Reference Number:** CB-379-23884636

**Tender Closing Date:** February 23, 2024, at 14:00 EST

**Release Date:** January 17, 2024

**Expected Contract Commencement Date:** February 27, 2024

**Expected Contract Completion Date:** March 20, 2024

**Solicitation Number:** 23-58191

**Procurement Method:** Open Bidding (Competitive)

**Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Request for Proposal**

The National Research Council of Canada (NRC) invites eligible bidders to submit a Technical Proposal and a Financial Proposal to provide one high current potentiostat/galvanostat for electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy. The contractor will also provide an optional additional unit.

**Objective:**

To provide a high-current potentiostat/galvanostat for electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, as specified in Annex A.

**Requirements:**

* The contractor must provide a comprehensive offer, including pricing details, that allows for a complete evaluation in accordance with the criteria set out in the solicitation.
* The offer must be in the format requested and include the front page of this request for proposal (RFP) duly completed.
* The offer must be submitted electronically to the designated email address no later than 14:00 EST on February 23, 2024.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

* Lowest Price

**Contract Terms and Conditions:**

* The contractor must comply with the instructions, clauses, and conditions of the solicitation and accept the terms and conditions of the resulting contract.
* The contractor grants to Canada the irrevocable option to purchase one additional unit under the same terms and conditions and at the prices and/or rates stated in the Contract within one year of the original contract date.
* The contract will remain open for acceptance for a period of not less than 60 days from the closing date of the bid solicitation, unless otherwise indicated by NRC.

**Contact Information:**

* Name: Tania Backes
* Email: [Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca](mailto:Tania.Backes@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (613) 410-3834
* Address: 1200 Montreal Road, Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0R6, Canada
